Package index

All functions

app_forecast_biomass()
Forecast forest stocks for a stand
app_select_stand()
Select stands from an interactive map
clear_model_cache()
Clear model cache
forecast_biomass()
Project forest stocks over a plot file
forecast_biomass_batch()
Forecast forest stocks for many stands simultaneusly
get_model()
Get loaded model
list_cached_models()
List cached models
list_csvs()
List the CSV files in a directory
load_model()
Load model from PURR repository with caching
make_gif()
Create GIF Animation from Images in Folder
model_status()
Get model loading status
plot_means()
Compute the plot-wise means for some variables in a "matrix model" data frame
project_biomass()
Project forest stocks over a plot file
project_biomass_batch()
Project forest stocks for many plots
set_model_options()
Set package options for model loading
stacked_dgp_chart()
Create interactive stacked area chart of DGP metrics
validate_wide_matrix()
Validate Wide Matrix Data Format
view_sp_dbh_heatmap()
Create interactive heatmap of species by DGP for a single year
view_sp_dbh_heatmap_gg()
Create static heatmap of species by DGP for single or multiple years using ggplot2
view_sp_trends_heatmap()
Create interactive heatmap of species by year
view_sp_trends_line()
Plot species trends over time using plotly
